General.Name: Jilin Zixin Pharmaceutical Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Jilin Zixin Pharmaceutical Industrial Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells Chinese medicines and gene sequencers in China. It provides ginseng drugs, prescription drugs, and OTC drugs. The company offers its products in the form of pills, tablets, hard capsules, oral liquids, granules, oral solutions, mixtures, soft capsules, and lozenges. Jilin Zixin Pharmaceutical Industrial Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Changchun, China.
